jcr:root.jcr:description: I’m looking at a list of all the Boston qualifiers from Colorado to California, but I don’t know what the best option is. Las Vegas? Los Angeles? Does anyone know?
jcr:root.jcr:title: What’s the best Boston qualifier on the west coast?
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

_x0036_0dt-i_ran_the_marathon.jcr:description: I ran the ½ marathon in St. George and loved it. The race was really well organized, and Southern Utah in October is beautiful.
_x0036_0dt-i_ran_the_marathon.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

szkd-that_reallydepends.jcr:description: That really depends on what type of race you are looking for. If you want to run a more competitive race with a lot more people trying to qualify with you, then definitely take a look at the Santa Rosa in California. If you’re looking for a more relaxed run in nice weather I would recommend St. George in Utah…one of my favorites.
szkd-that_reallydepends.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
